verses.verse: Now concerning the collection for God's people, as I have given orders to the congregations in Galatia, even so you do.
On the first of the week let every one of you lay aside some funds as [God] has prospered him, so that there is no collections when I come.
And when I come whomever you approve by your letters, I will send to bring your freely offered gift to Jerusalem.
And if it be worthwhile that I go, too, they will go with me.
Now I will come to you when I pass thought Macedonia, for I will pass through Macedonia.
And it may be that I will stay, yes, even winter with you, so that you may further me on my journey wherever I will be going.
For I will not see you now in passing, but I expect to stay awhile with you, if the Lord wills.
But I will stay at Ephesus until Pentecost.
For a great and effectual door has opened for me, yet there are many adversaries.
Now if Timothy comes, see to it that he may be with you without fear, for he is engaged in the Lord's work just as I am.
Therefore let no one despise him, but send him on with peace, so that he may come to me, for I look for him along with the brethren.
Concerning our brother Apollos, I greatly desired him to come to you along with the brethren, but it was not his will to come at this time, but he will come when he has the opportunity.
Be on the alert, firmly stand in the faith; don't be cowardly, be strong.
Let everything you do be with love.
I plead with you, brethren, you know that the household of Stephanas is the first fruits of Achaia, and they are completely devoted to the ministry to God's people.
And that you submit yourselves to such and to everyone who helps and works with us.
I am glad for the coming of Stephanas, Fortunatus, and Achaicus, for what was lacking on your part, they have supplied.
For they have refreshed my spirit and yours; therefore acknowledge those that are of this sort.
The congregations of Asia greet you. Aquila and Priscilla warmly greet you and also the congregation that is in their house.
All the brethren greet you. Greet one another with a holy kiss.
The greeting by me, Paul, with my own hand.
If any one does not love the Lord Jesus Christ, the same be anathema. Maranatha!
The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you.
My love be with you all in Christ Jesus. Amen.
